title: You Can Run
description: Trisha Hanover has a history of running away from home, but this time she hasn't come back. To make matters worse, Robyn said something mean to Trisha in a moment of anger. Feeling responsible for Trisha's disappearance, Robyn sets out to track her down. But when she discovers Trisha, Robyn also finds enough danger for the both of them.
author: Norah McClintock
